description: These rain pants infuse the durability and lightweight waterproof protection of the Helium Collection that's been tested and trusted since 2010. Packing down to the size of your palm, these make a great emergency layer or dependable option for fast-and-light adventures.
name: Outdoor Research Helium Rain Pants, Reg - Mens

specs.value: bluesign® approved Pertex® Shield Diamond Fuse 2.5L, bluesign® approved 100% Nylon, 30D Ripstop
